original_text: And when the jubile of the children of Israel shall be, then shall their inheritance be put unto the inheritance of the tribe whereunto they are received: so shall their inheritance be taken away from the inheritance of the tribe of our fathers.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 희년을 당하여 그 기업이 그가 속한 지파에 첨가될 것이라 그런즉 그들의 기업은 우리 조상 지파의 기업에서 아주 삭감되리이다

sentences.original_text: And when the jubile of the children of Israel shall be
then shall their inheritance be put
unto the inheritance of the tribe whereunto they are received
so shall their inheritance be taken away
from the inheritance of the tribe of our fathers
